General.Name: Shenyang Jinshan Energy Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenyang Jinshan Energy Co., Ltd. produces and sells electricity and heat in the Liaoning and Inner Mongolia regions of China. It generates electricity using wind, thermal, and photovoltaic power. The company was formerly known as Shenyang Jinshan Thermoelectric Co., Ltd. The company was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shenyang, China.
